meanings.meaning_en_US: To employ for some purpose; to put into service.

examples.sentence: You can [use] the library for research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以使用圖書館進行研究。

examples.sentence: Please [use] this tool carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請小心地使用這個工具。

examples.sentence: I'm not sure how to [use] this software.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不確定如何使用這個軟體。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Satisfactory, acceptable.

examples.sentence: It's [OK] to ask for help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 尋求幫助是可以接受的。

examples.sentence: She said it was [OK] to borrow her book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她說借她的書是可以的。

examples.sentence: [OK], let's move on to the next topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 好吧，讓我們進入下一個主題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device with several parts that work together to perform a specific task.

examples.sentence: The [machine] broke down during the operation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該機器在操作期間故障了

examples.sentence: He operates a [machine] that prints newspapers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他操作一台印刷報紙的機器

examples.sentence: This [machine] can process data quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這台機器可以快速處理數據

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of 24 hours as a unit of time, reckoned from one midnight to the next.

examples.sentence: Today is a sunny [day].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天是一個晴朗的一天。

examples.sentence: We have a busy [day] ahead of us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們有繁忙的一天在等著。

examples.sentence: My birthday is on a special [day].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日是在一個特別的日子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equal to two tens; 20.

examples.sentence: There are [twenty] students in the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 班上有二十名學生。

examples.sentence: She will turn [twenty] next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她下個月將滿二十歲。

examples.sentence: The ticket costs [twenty] dollars.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 票價是二十美元。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to emphasize something surprising or extreme.

examples.sentence: She can [even] speak three languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她甚至會說三種語言

examples.sentence: It was [even] harder than I thought.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這比我想的還要困難

examples.sentence: They [even] apologized.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們甚至道歉了

meanings.meaning_en_US: Perceive with the eyes; discern visually.

examples.sentence: I can [see] the mountains from here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可以從這裡看到山。

examples.sentence: Did you [see] that movie last night?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你昨晚看到那部電影了嗎？

examples.sentence: She turned to [see] who was calling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她轉身查看是誰在叫。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person's regular occupation, profession, or trade.

examples.sentence: She runs her own [business].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她經營自己的生意。

examples.sentence: It’s none of your [business].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這不關你的事。

examples.sentence: The [business] is booming.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家公司蓬勃發展。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of helping or doing work for someone.

examples.sentence: The hotel provided excellent [service].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家酒店提供優秀的服務。

examples.sentence: Customer [service] is very important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 顧客服務非常重要。

examples.sentence: He offered his [services] for the charity event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為慈善活動提供了服務。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to express possibility or permission.

examples.sentence: You [may] leave early today.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你今天可以早點離開

examples.sentence: It [may] rain later, so take your umbrella.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 等一下可能會下雨，所以帶上你的雨傘

examples.sentence: We [may] go to the movies this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們這個周末可能會去看電影

meanings.meaning_en_US: The gas and other products given off when a substance is burned.

examples.sentence: The [smoke] from the fire filled the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 火焰產生的煙霧充滿了房間。

examples.sentence: He couldn't see through the thick [smoke].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他無法透過濃厚的煙霧看清楚。

examples.sentence: The [smoke] alarm went off when it detected fire.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 煙霧警報器在偵測到火災時響起。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A position to the left or right of an object, person, or place.

examples.sentence: Please stand by my [side].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請站在我身邊。

examples.sentence: The house has a beautiful garden on the [side].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這棟房子的一側有個美麗的花園。

examples.sentence: He has a tattoo on the left [side] of his chest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在胸部左側有個刺青。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of people related to one another, typically consisting of parents and their children.

examples.sentence: My [family] is planning a reunion next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的家庭計畫下個月舉行一次團聚

examples.sentence: He comes from a large [family].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他來自一個大家庭

examples.sentence: They value [family] traditions very much.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們非常重視家庭傳統

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flying insect known for its role in pollination and producing honey.

examples.sentence: The [bee] buzzed around the flowers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蜜蜂在花叢中嗡嗡作響。

examples.sentence: She is afraid of getting stung by a [bee].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她害怕被蜜蜂 sting。

examples.sentence: A [bee] plays a critical role in the ecosystem.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蜜蜂在生態系統中扮演重要角色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To feel intense or passionate dislike for someone or something.

examples.sentence: I [hate] it when people lie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我討厭人們撒謊。

examples.sentence: She [hates] waiting in long lines.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她討厭在長隊中等候。

examples.sentence: They [hate] injustice in all forms.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們痛恨一切形式的不公正。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Enjoyment, amusement, or lighthearted pleasure.

examples.sentence: We had a lot of [fun] at the amusement park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在遊樂園玩得很開心。

examples.sentence: The party was full of [fun] activities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 派對上有很多有趣的活動。

examples.sentence: Playing games is a great way to have [fun].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 玩遊戲是享受樂趣的好方法。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The second month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, typically having 28 days.

examples.sentence: I was born in [February].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我是在二月出生的。

examples.sentence: February is a short month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 二月是一個短月。

examples.sentence: [February] has only 28 days, except in leap years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 二月只有28天，除了閏年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Identical; not different.

examples.sentence: We wore the [same] costumes for Halloween.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們穿著相同的萬聖節服裝。

examples.sentence: These two products are the [same] in quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這兩個產品在質量上是相同的。

examples.sentence: They have the [same] idea as we do.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的想法和我們的是相同的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: All things; all that exists.

examples.sentence: She believes in everything she reads.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她相信她所讀的所有事物。

examples.sentence: Everything has its time and place.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 所有事物都有它的時間和地點。

examples.sentence: I want to learn everything about this topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想了解這個主題的所有事物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the past; before the present time.

examples.sentence: I graduated from college two years [ago].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我兩年前從大學畢業。

examples.sentence: She moved to the city long [ago].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她早在很久以前就搬到了這座城市。

examples.sentence: We met each other three days [ago].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們三天前見過面。
